lines.text: You'd think with all those bridges you guys wouldn't be afraid to burn one every once and a while
Everybody has to work for somebody. Even Michael-Angelo had to please the Pope.
The Pope didn't ask for parking space
We weren't a family. We were a corporation. With a kid.
So, Richard, huh?
Who?
Richard! Pancakes in the shape of animals, Richard!
He's a friend of the family
Does she eat them at least?
Not usually
Y'know what Neal asked me just out of the blue? He asked me whatever happened to us. I couldn't tell him.
You fell in love with another woman
I mean before that
Do you need a ride tonight? To the museum thing?
I have a lift
Pancake-man?
I don't think we can do this anymore. Come to the same office everyday.
You're right. You're fired.
That's okay, you can come. The shutters in the guest room are still broken anyways.
Oh, that's right! Gotta get around to fixing that
Well, you better, 'cause it's gonna be your room!

[after Sally lists all the traits her family found about Vincent, he decides to add one]
Sexually-irresistable?
Oh, my grandmother said that
Well, since you know my name I thought I could at least know yours
Olivia Marshak
Oh wow! From Step Magazine!
[sits down]
You have your picture on the top of the column, right? I knew I recognized you, I have incredible visual memory.
Would you like to sit down?
Oh no, that's okay. Your magazine gets delievered to our office. The younger staff really likes it.
Oh, the young people, God bless 'em

[while on payphone]
... I'm crazy about you. I've always been crazy about you. I'm always gonna be crazy about you. Oh by the way, this is Vincent. Vincent Eastman.

[while playing sherades, Vincent is struggling, so Olivia lifts up her top]
Titties! A Tale of Two Cities!
Yes!
I never read that
My uncle used to say going on a boat was like being in jail with a chance of drowning.
Vincent, it's the most beautiful...
...demonstration...
...I've ever seen

[while Vincent is lying on top of her]
What was your name again?
You don't live with her but your car still does? What else do you leave with her? A toothbrush? A pair of slippers?
A daughter
Second thoughts?
I'm still not happy with the spacing of the columns

[Just entering room]
Is he starting that again?
What are you doing up here? You're supposed to be mingling!
I think I'm mingled out

[starts to raise her voice]
I know this is an important night for the trustees! Is Meaghan a trustee? So young yet so accomplished!
Don't you dare get angry at me because you're fucking another woman! It lacks conviction.
